title: From every shires ende
brief_description: Life in Mediaeval England as illustrated in manuscripts, carvings, brasses etc of the time, combined with views of castles, churches and the countryside along the route of the Canterbury Pilgrims, presenting some of the background of Chaucer’s Tales.
